text: Giles Heneage Radice, Baron Radice, (4 October 1936 – 25 August 2022) was a British Labour politician and author. He was a Member of Parliament (MP) from 1973 to 2001. He later became a member of the House of Lords from 2001 until shortly before his death in 2022. Radice died from cancer on 25 August 2022, at age 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Labour Life Peers Category:UK MPs 1970–1974 Category:UK MPs 1974 Category:UK MPs 1974–1979 Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:Politicians from London Category:Writers from London Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs
title: Giles Radice
